original_text: “‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: I will deal with you as you deserve, because you have despised my oath by breaking the covenant.
korean_text: 나 주 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 네가 맹세를 멸시하여 언약을 배반하였은즉 내가 네 행한 대로 네게 행하리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
I will deal with you as you deserve,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 마땅히 받을 대로 너를 다룰 것이며,

sentences.original_text: because you have despised my oath
